HTTP_Status_Codes.400: Bad Request. The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.
HTTP_Status_Codes.401: Unauthorized. The request requires user authentication or, if the request included authorization credentials, authorization has been refused for those credentials.
HTTP_Status_Codes.404: Not Found. The server has not found anything that matches the Request-URI.
HTTP_Status_Codes.500: Internal Server Error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.
